import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplArticle extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { nomUnite: '', poids: '', prixUnitaire: '', prixKg: '', sousArticle: '', selectedFamilleArticles: '' } } componentDidMount() { let id_article = this.props.location.state.id_article; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_snaii/GetArticleById.php?id=' + id_article).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ idArticle: res.data[0][0].id_article, nomUnite: res.data[0][0].nomUnite, poids: res.data[0][0].poids, prixUnitaire: res.data[0][0].prixUnitaire, prixKg: res.data[0][0].prixKg, sousArticle: res.data[0][0].sousArticle, selectedFamilleArticles: res.data[1][0].label }) }) } render() { return (

Informations article

); } } export default ExplArticle;
